tool_description: Calculates optimal packaging dimensions and materials based on item specifications, fragility requirements, and shipping constraints.

multiple_items.description: Number of identical items to pack together

error_messages: Invalid dimensions: All item dimensions must be positive numbers greater than 0.
Invalid weight: Item weight must be a positive number.
Invalid fragility level: Use one of [low, medium, high, fragile].
Invalid packaging preference: Use one of [minimal, standard, protective, eco_friendly].
Item too large: Item exceeds maximum packageable dimensions.
Multiple items limit exceeded: Cannot calculate packaging for more than 50 identical items.
usage: Provide item dimensions (length, width, height) and weight. Optionally specify fragility_level, multiple_items count, and packaging_preference. Returns optimal packaging specifications and material recommendations.

total_weight.description: Total package weight including packaging materials

estimated_cost.description: Estimated packaging material cost in USD
